definition: Xiangxiang county level city in Xiangtan 湘潭[Xiang1 tan2], Hunan
abbr. for Hunan 湖南 province in south central China/abbr. for Xiangjiang river in Hunan province
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
Xiangxiang county level city in Xiangtan 湘潭[Xiang1 tan2], Hunan

sentences.english: Luo Zenan, a rationalistic Confucian philosopher of Xiang Troop, came from a poor family of Hunan countryside.
sentences.chinese: 湘軍理學家羅澤南出生於湖南湘鄉一個貧困的家庭裏。

sentences.english: The last part is the some suggestions to the compulsory education development of Xiangxiang.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分爲對湘鄉義務教育發展提出幾點建議。
